create-entity.person.dates: Add or edit person birth or death dates
create-entity.person-more.description: Please review the information (feel free to add a comment below)

create-entity.withdbpedia.select: Select one dbpedia entity from the list, or

crowd.whois.description: We are missing some basic information about him/her and we're not sure about his/her identity

annotation.image.description: This will improve the quality of your recommended resources
grammar.filters.relatedto.search.title: add entity
guided-tour.welcome:
Welcome to histograph!

We use cookies to track your usage and preferences.
guided-tour.skip: You can access the guided tour from your personal space at any time.
guided-tour.step.view.gallery: You can choose between gallery and graph view. You are now in gallery view.
guided-tour.step.view.gallery.resource: Select a resource to continue to part 2 of the guided tour.
guided-tour.step.filters.timeline: You can select a specific period on the timeline to see resources from that period.
guided-tour.step.filters.type: Both views can be filtered according to the type of resource.
guided-tour.step.filters.related-to: You can also filter by people, locations, institutions or themes.
guided-tour.step.view.graph: You can select graph views with different types of nodes (e.g. people or locations). A line connecting two nodes indicates that they are mentioned together in a document. More frequent co-occurrences are represented by thicker lines. Clicking on a line shows the resources which contain both nodes.
guided-tour.step.view.resource.pinboard: You can add resources to your pinboard ( ). Then click on my pinboard to explore relations between them and to discover new resources.
guided-tour.step.view.resource.favourite: You can also add resources to your bookmarks ( ). Resources stored in bookmarks will remain available to you for future reference.
guided-tour.step.view.resource.seealso: This is a list of recommended resources based on the tags of a selected resource.
guided-tour.step.view.resource.seealso.f: You can use the categories above to filter the results in the list of recommended resources.
guided-tour.step.view.resource.add: You can add, tag or edit people, institutions or locations. This will improve the quality of the recommended resources.
guided-tour.step.view.resource.annotate: To tag a person, institution or location in the text or in an image, highlight it and click tag. Select the best fit from the suggestions or create a new entity.
guided-tour.step.view.resource.click.ent: histograph automatically detects people, institutions and locations, which means that mistakes are inevitable. To fix a mistake, click on a tag, select fix/edit and choose the appropriate way to solve the problem. We would also appreciate it if you could confirm valid tags.
guided-tour.step.view.resource.notificat: Notifications give you updates on the activities of other users. Click to agree or disagree with them.
login.welcome: Welcome to the histograph collaborative platform. Sign up or log in to start
myselection.title: your selection
myselection.description: find interesting resources and entities in your selection
popit.missinginfo: We couldn't find any information about this {{type}} automatically... can you help us?
popit.fix.wrong.entity: Do you really want to untag this {{type}}?
popit.fix.wrong.agree: Some users suggested that this {{type}} should be untagged. Do you agree?
popit.fix.brandnew: Nope, this is a brand new {{type}}
popit.fix.typo: this is a typo / fragment / duplicate
popit.fix.typo.description: Does {{name}} correspond to someone else in histograph?
popit.fix.spotcorrecttype.label: This is ... ?
popit.fix.spotcorrecttype.type.irrelevan: Do you really want to untag this {{type}}?
popit.fix.spotcorrecttype.type.confirm: Suggest {{_type}} as replacement for {{type}}?
popit.fix.suggest.confirm: Do you think that {{name}} should be replaced with {{_name}}?
